import React from 'react' import { Parallax } from 'react-parallax' import { ParallaxBanner, ParallaxBannerLayer } from 'react-scroll-parallax'; function SectionCard(props) { return (

{props.tagline}

{props.heading}

{props.description}

) } export default SectionCard
